channel.title: All Quest Done On Login?
channel.description:
Ok well i'm using a delta based source, and i need someone to tell me how to make it so when you start all quest's are already done.
thanks in advanced! :P

item.title: All Quest Done On Login?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Stop filling up process, christ.

Read full topic

item.title: All Quest Done On Login?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“Darkning, post:2, topic:268580”]under your intitialize() in your client class add:

q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; q11 = 15;

Or make a command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("quests")) { q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; q11 = 15; sendQuest("@gre@Lost City", 7332); sendQuest("@gre@Rune Mysteries", 7333); sendQuest("@gre@Desert Treasure", 7334); sendQuest("@gre@Vampire Slayer", 7336); sendQuest("@gre@Monkey Madness", 7383); sendQuest("@gre@Sheep Shearer", 7339); sendQuest("@gre@Legends Quest", 7338); sendQuest("@gre@Lunar Diplomacy", 7340); sendQuest("@gre@Knight's Legend", 7346); sendQuest("@gre@Lunar Spirit", 7341); sendQuest("@gre@The Wolf's Cure", 7342); }[/quote]Thanks the world! Rep++

Read full topic

item.title: All Quest Done On Login?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

under your intitialize() in your client class add:

q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; q11 = 15;

Or make a command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("quests")) { q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; q11 = 15; sendQuest("@gre@Lost City", 7332); sendQuest("@gre@Rune Mysteries", 7333); sendQuest("@gre@Desert Treasure", 7334); sendQuest("@gre@Vampire Slayer", 7336); sendQuest("@gre@Monkey Madness", 7383); sendQuest("@gre@Sheep Shearer", 7339); sendQuest("@gre@Legends Quest", 7338); sendQuest("@gre@Lunar Diplomacy", 7340); sendQuest("@gre@Knight's Legend", 7346); sendQuest("@gre@Lunar Spirit", 7341); sendQuest("@gre@The Wolf's Cure", 7342); }
